author: Ultimate_Bricks
title: An ok little set
review:
The build

This set is an interesting incarnation of the undersized helicopter concept, it doesn't look minifigure scale because it's not supposed to be. The build is simple, but fun to put together. As far as parts go the 1x4 printed tile, the windshield and the camera are the best parts.

Minifigure

The one minifigure is pretty cool. Starting from the top, she has a standard white helmet with a trans black visor. The face print is new for 2017 and shows black sunglasses and a mouth with lipstick. The torso is also new for 2017 and shows a badge a walkie-talkie, and a radio on a brown belt. The color for the torso is dark blue, but the hands are dark bluish gray. The legs are just plain dark blue with no prints.

Conclusion

Overall I think it is a nice poly bag, but, not worth more than $5 so if you got it for free from the Lego store it is great. In the end, I hope this review was helpful and informative.

author: nolimitbuilds
title: Good for parts not for play
review: Set came with a good minifig, and nice windshield. But the helicopter is not very playable.
